title: Examine Divine Blood · Divine Sense Search Fails

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第51集:检查神血·神念搜寻失败。

scenes.description: 韩立找了一处干净的地方,坐了下来,这才手上灵戒一闪,从储物镯上取出了那个血红小瓶,目放奇光的打量起来。

visual.composition: Han Li finds clean place, sits down, then hand spirit ring flashes, takes out that blood red small bottle from storage bracelet, eyes emit strange light examining

scenes.prompt: Han Li finds clean place, sits down, then hand spirit ring flashes, takes out that blood red small bottle from storage bracelet, eyes emit strange light examining.
scenes.narration: 韩立找了一处干净的地方坐下,从储物镯上取出了那个血红小瓶,目放奇光的打量起来。

scenes.description: 此瓶除了不停散发着血红光芒外,其他一切倒也普通之极,材质摸上去光滑异常,似乎就是普通的瓷器。

visual.composition: This bottle besides continuously emitting blood red glow, everything else ordinary, material feels smooth, seems ordinary porcelain
visual.character_pose: Bottle in hand, Han Li examining
visual.fx: Blood red glow, ordinary porcelain appearance

scenes.prompt: This bottle besides continuously emitting blood red glow, everything else ordinary, material feels smooth, seems ordinary porcelain.
scenes.narration: 此瓶除了不停散发着血红光芒外,其他一切倒也普通之极,材质摸上去光滑异常。

scenes.description: 韩立用手指轻轻抚摸着小瓶,心中暗自嘀咕着,同时脑中不禁浮现出那名叫噬炎灵族对神血的一切记忆。

visual.composition: Han Li with finger gently strokes small bottle, heart muttering, brain can't help floating that name Devouring Flame Spirit Race's all memories about divine blood

scenes.prompt: Han Li with finger gently strokes small bottle, heart muttering, brain can't help floating that name Devouring Flame Spirit Race's all memories about divine blood.
scenes.narration: 韩立用手指轻轻抚摸着小瓶,脑中不禁浮现出噬炎灵族对神血的一切记忆。

scenes.description: 半晌后,他眉头一皱下,又从储物镯中取出一个巴掌大的碧玉圆钵,这才将血红小瓶的盖子打开,对准圆钵轻轻一斜的倒下。

visual.composition: After a while, his eyebrows wrinkle, again takes out palm-sized jade green round bowl from storage bracelet, then opens blood red small bottle's lid, toward round bowl lightly tilts pours

scenes.prompt: After a while, his eyebrows wrinkle, again takes out palm-sized jade green round bowl from storage bracelet, then opens blood red small bottle's lid, toward round bowl lightly tilts pours.
scenes.narration: 半晌后,他又从储物镯中取出一个碧玉圆钵,将血红小瓶的盖子打开,对准圆钵轻轻一斜的倒下。

scenes.description: 瓶口紫芒流转,好半天才有七八滴深紫色液体缓缓倒出,掉在圆钵中全都一滴滴的立刻分散开来,竟然无法融合一体。

visual.composition: Bottle mouth purple light flows, long time before seven eight drops deep purple liquid slowly pour out, drop in round bowl all immediately scatter separately, actually cannot merge together

scenes.prompt: Bottle mouth purple light flows, long time before seven eight drops deep purple liquid slowly pour out, drop in round bowl all immediately scatter separately, actually cannot merge together.
scenes.narration: 瓶口紫芒流转,好半天才有七八滴深紫色液体缓缓倒出,掉在圆钵中立刻分散开来。

scenes.description: 韩立双目一眯的仔细凝望了一会儿,才伸出一根手指,在其中一滴紫液上轻轻一点。结果在其手指似触非触的一瞬间,这紫色液体竟蓦然自行跳起,一下将其指尖包裹进了其中,就想要就此侵入似的。

visual.composition: Han Li's eyes squint carefully watches a while, then extends one finger, lightly touches one drop purple liquid, result in finger almost touching moment, this purple liquid actually suddenly jumps up, instantly wraps fingertip, wants to invade
visual.environment: Cave interior, close-up of finger and liquid

scenes.prompt: Han Li's eyes squint carefully watches a while, then extends one finger, lightly touches one drop purple liquid, result in finger almost touching moment, this purple liquid actually suddenly jumps up, instantly wraps fingertip, wants to invade.
scenes.narration: 韩立伸出一根手指轻轻一点,紫色液体竟蓦然自行跳起,一下将其指尖包裹进了其中。

scenes.description: 但是韩立眉梢一挑下,手指上金光一闪,就将这紫液隔断在了肌肤之外,然后轻轻一抖之下,液体就再次滑落入了圆钵中。

visual.composition: But Han Li's eyebrow raises, finger golden light flashes, cuts off purple liquid outside skin, then lightly shakes, liquid again slides into round bowl
visual.character_pose: Finger with golden light, repelling liquid

scenes.prompt: But Han Li's eyebrow raises, finger golden light flashes, cuts off purple liquid outside skin, then lightly shakes, liquid again slides into round bowl.
scenes.narration: 但是韩立眉梢一挑下,手指上金光一闪,就将这紫液隔断在了肌肤之外,然后轻轻一抖。

scenes.description: 不错,果然是灵族神血不假。韩立目中闪过兴奋之色。

visual.composition: Good, indeed spirit race divine blood real, Han Li's eyes flash excited color

scenes.prompt: Good, indeed spirit race divine blood real, Han Li's eyes flash excited color.
scenes.narration: 不错,果然是灵族神血不假,韩立目中闪过兴奋之色,确认了神血的真假。

scenes.description: 下面,他将这些紫液再次倒入小瓶中,然后小心的收进储物镯中,自己则静心的在山洞中打坐休息起来。

visual.composition: Below, he pours these purple liquids again into small bottle, then carefully stores in storage bracelet, himself peacefully sits in cave meditating resting

scenes.prompt: Below, he pours these purple liquids again into small bottle, then carefully stores in storage bracelet, himself peacefully sits in cave meditating resting.
scenes.narration: 下面,他将这些紫液再次倒入小瓶中,然后小心的收进储物镯中,静心打坐休息起来。

scenes.description: 虽然他现在法力全无,但辟谷能力却未失分毫,根本不用吃喝什么的。

visual.composition: Although he now has no spiritual power at all, but fasting ability hasn't lost at all, don't need to eat or drink anything
visual.character_pose: Han Li sitting calmly, no need for food

scenes.prompt: Although he now has no spiritual power at all, but fasting ability hasn't lost at all, don't need to eat or drink anything.
scenes.narration: 虽然他现在法力全无,但辟谷能力却未失分毫,根本不用吃喝什么的。

scenes.description: 开始的数天内,这些神念的搜索频繁异常,恨不得一天十几次的扫过。但过了半月后,立刻变得只有两三次了。

visual.composition: Beginning several days, these divine sense searches extremely frequent, wish dozen times day sweep, but after half month, immediately becomes only two three times
visual.environment: Cave interior, divine sense waves passing
visual.character_pose: Han Li sitting calmly, divine sense decreasing

scenes.prompt: Beginning several days, these divine sense searches extremely frequent, wish dozen times day sweep, but after half month, immediately becomes only two three times.
scenes.narration: 开始的数天内,这些神念的搜索频繁异常,但过了半月后,立刻变得只有两三次了。

scenes.description: 而再等两个月后,则只有一天一次了,而且动用的神念也明显远远比不上以前的强大,明显搜查之人换了。

visual.composition: And wait another two months, then only once day, and used divine sense obviously far weaker than before, clearly searchers changed
visual.environment: Cave interior, weak divine sense passing
visual.character_pose: Han Li sitting, weak divine sense passing

scenes.prompt: And wait another two months, then only once day, and used divine sense obviously far weaker than before, clearly searchers changed.
scenes.narration: 而再等两个月后,则只有一天一次了,而且动用的神念也明显远远比不上以前的强大。

scenes.description: 但韩立不动声色的仍躲在石洞中未出去。

visual.composition: But Han Li without expression still hides in stone cave not going out

scenes.prompt: But Han Li without expression still hides in stone cave not going out.
scenes.narration: 但韩立不动声色的仍躲在石洞中未出去,继续保持耐心等待。

scenes.description: 就这般半年时间一闪而过,再也没有神念出现了。

visual.composition: Just like this half year time flashes past, no more divine sense appearing
visual.character_pose: Han Li sitting, no divine sense

scenes.prompt: Just like this half year time flashes past, no more divine sense appearing.
scenes.narration: 就这般半年时间一闪而过,再也没有神念出现了,山洞恢复了平静。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第52集即将开始。
